typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		ntt_breathingspacetypeid as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_debtorid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		ntt_activeregister as string,
		ntt_triggerpointofcontactsubmitnotification as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		ntt_referencenumber as string,
		ntt_triggerdebtorsubmitnotification as string,
		createdby as string,
		ntt_breathingspacestatusid as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		ntt_breathingspacemoratoriumid as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		owninguser as string,
		ntt_midwayquestionanswer as string,
		ntt_commencementdate as string,
		ntt_retentionperiodenddate as string,
		ntt_retentionperiodstartdate as string,
		ntt_closuredate as string,
		ntt_submissiondate as string,
		ntt_activeregisterperiodstartdate as string,
		ntt_parentcancellationreasonid as string,
		ntt_expirydate as string,
		ntt_activeregisterperiodenddate as string,
		ntt_midwayquestionrequired as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		ntt_managingmoneyadviserorganisationid as string,
		ntt_mhreviewquestionrequired as string,
		timezoneruleversionnumber as string,
		ntt_mhreviewquestionanswer as string,
		ntt_modifiedbyclientid as string,
		ntt_modifiedbyemailaddress as string,
		ntt_modifiedbyname as string,
		ntt_modifiedbymoneyadviserorganisation as string,
		ntt_createdfromapi as string,
		ntt_childcancellationreasonid as string,
		ntt_modifiedbycreditororganisation as string,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		tsNTTActiveRegisterPeriodStartDate as timestamp,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceMoratoriumId as string,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceStatusId as string,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceTypeId as string,
		strNTTChildCancellationReasonId as string,
		tsNTTClosureDate as timestamp,
		tsNTTCommencementDate as timestamp,
		blNTTCreatedFromAPI as boolean,
		strNTTDebtorId as string,
		tsNTTExpiryDate as timestamp,
		strNTTManagingMoneyAdviserOrganisationId as string,
		strNTTParentCancellationReasonId as string,
		tsNTTRemovedFromRegisterDate as timestamp,
		tsNTTSubmissionDate as timestamp,
		blNTTActiveRegister as boolean,
		blIsTruncate as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceValidation
sourceValidation select(mapColumn(
		statecode,
		statuscode,
		ntt_breathingspacetypeid,
		createdon,
		ntt_debtorid,
		ownerid,
		modifiedon,
		ntt_activeregister,
		ntt_triggerpointofcontactsubmitnotification,
		modifiedby,
		ntt_referencenumber,
		ntt_triggerdebtorsubmitnotification,
		createdby,
		ntt_breathingspacestatusid,
		owningbusinessunit,
		ntt_breathingspacemoratoriumid,
		ntt_name,
		owninguser,
		ntt_midwayquestionanswer,
		ntt_commencementdate,
		ntt_retentionperiodenddate,
		ntt_retentionperiodstartdate,
		ntt_closuredate,
		ntt_submissiondate,
		ntt_activeregisterperiodstartdate,
		ntt_parentcancellationreasonid,
		ntt_expirydate,
		ntt_activeregisterperiodenddate,
		ntt_midwayquestionrequired,
		intBatchId,
		partdist,
		ntt_mhreviewquestionrequired,
		ntt_managingmoneyadviserorganisationid,
		ntt_createdfromapi,
		ntt_mhreviewquestionanswer,
		blIsValid,
		tsCreatedOn,
		tsModifiedOn,
		tsNTTActiveRegisterPeriodStartDate,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceMoratoriumId,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceStatusId,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceTypeId,
		strNTTChildCancellationReasonId,
		tsNTTClosureDate,
		tsNTTCommencementDate,
		blNTTCreatedFromAPI,
		strNTTDebtorId,
		tsNTTExpiryDate,
		strNTTManagingMoneyAdviserOrganisationId,
		strNTTParentCancellationReasonId,
		tsNTTRemovedFromRegisterDate,
		tsNTTSubmissionDate,
		blNTTActiveRegister,
		blIsTruncate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowSink
AlterRowSink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/moratoriums/breathingspacemoratorium',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['strNTTBreathingSpaceMoratoriumId'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partdist
	)) ~> sinkODS
